abstract: The rejection forestalls, at least for now, the creation of what would be the largest power company in the nation.
snippet: The rejection forestalls, at least for now, the creation of what would be the largest power company in the nation.
lead_paragraph: NRG Energy, a power generator based in Princeton, N.J., said Sunday it had rejected an unsolicited takeover bid by Exelon, saying the offer “manifestly undervalues” the company.

headline.main: NRG Leaves Door Open After Rejecting Takeover Bid
headline.print_headline: NRG Leaves Door Open After Rejecting Takeover Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Zachery Kouwe
